system.description: A binding spell creates a magical restraint to hold a creature. The target gets an initial saving throw only if its Hit Dice equal at least one-half your caster level. You may have up to six assistants (suggestion or dominate spells) to increase your effective caster level. All binding spells are dismissible. Six versions: Chaining (antipathy, 1 year/level); Slumber (comatose, 1 year/level, save DC -1); Bound Slumber (1 month/level, save DC -2); Hedged Prison (permanent confinement, save DC -3); Metamorphosis (gaseous in jar, permanent, save DC -4); Minimus Containment (1 inch in gem/jar, permanent, save DC -4). You can set release conditions (+2 save DC). Dispel magic does not remove binding; antimagic field or Mage's disjunction does.

components.materialDescription: Props suited to binding type (500 gp), opals worth 500 gp per HD of target, vellum depiction or carved statuette of subject.
